name: Playcurio Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of a learning platform designed to make learning fun through the combination of real teaching aids and digital contents. The company's platform offers augmented reality and virtual reality content with accessibility to tablets, pc, mobile, television and 3D animation and presents joy to children with quality digital contents, enabling children to learn while playing.
one_liner: Developer of a learning platform designed to make learning fun through the combination of real teaching aids and digital contents. The company's platform offers augmented reality and virtual reality content with accessibility to tablets, pc, mobile, television and 3D animation and presents joy to children with quality digital contents, enabling children to learn while playing.
